icon by gryphll

tags: i hope that its okay that i did both of these?
question: 48 or 69 ;) <3
answer:
Dan should have waited for Phil to get home. He knew it, but he had a stubborn streak that ran through him that was a bit hard to tame sometimes.

He lugged the giant box of decorations up the stairs and once he could set it down, went back downstairs to try and loft the tree upstairs.

Dan made it half way up the staircase when he heard the lock click and Phil’s footsteps on the foyer. Dan didn’t even have a chance to yell his location before Phil was standing below him and cackling.

“Why couldn’t you just wait for me? You never have any patience.” His words were spoken softly and with a kind smile so Dan didn’t take anything to heart.

“Welcome back. Now fucking help me.”

Phil stepped forward and together they easily maneuvered the box into the living room. The assembly was quick with the two of them working and they both eagerly pulled their box of decorations towards them so they could start decorating the tree.

“Why do we still have this?” Phil asked, holding up the huskie plushie ornament. “I thought that furry thing was like a joke?”

“Don’t kink shame me!” Dan gasped, clutching his chest dramatically.

Phil nudged him with his elbow and placed the bauble on the tree, his heart thumping happily.
